item.title: A composer, a professor, and a computer walk into a bar...
item.description:
… and have a contest about who writes the best music! Who wins? Read on to find out.

Audience: you! Especially if you’re interested in AI and music

item.title: bayz: live coding + bayesian program learning
item.description:
Introducing bayz: a live coding platform that combines the latest and greatest in Bayesian machine learning with uber nerd avant-garde performative music.

Audience: Professor Mark, and anyone else who stumbles here
